name: Home Sports
summary:
Get ready to play, laugh, and move like never before! Step into a mixed-reality world with five dynamic sports that everyone can enjoy. Whether you’re hosting a friendly match or showing off your skills, Home Sports brings the action to life —all designed for social fun.

Pickleball - Our simplified rules make the game more intuitive than ever! Swing your paddle and try to outsmart your opponent without hitting the net.
Hockey - Experience what feels like a mix between ice hockey and air hockey with this original twist! Bounce the puck off the sides or go straight for the goal.
Bowling - It’s not how you bowl, it’s how you roll! Will you be able to make a perfect 300? Or will you become a gutterball guru?
⛳Mini Golf - Try to get as many hole-in-ones and birdies as possible in three different beautiful courses: classic, modern and nature.
Badminton - Play the fastest racket sport in the world for the first time in mixed reality!

Invite up to three friends to join you, locally or online, and compete in thrilling multiplayer action. Every sport adapts to your personal play space, making it easy to jump straight into the action. Whether you’re aiming for a hole-in-one in mini golf or defending the net in hockey, Home Sports is packed with endless entertainment, laughter, and competition.

Want to become the best of class? The game also features solo matches, drills and a career mode.

Experience your favorite sports like never before. Play today!
